# ThirdwebSDKProviderProps interface

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface ThirdwebSDKProviderProps<TChains extends Chain[] = typeof defaultChains> extends QueryClientProviderProps 
```
**Extends:** QueryClientProviderProps
